explains: n. 促进者；发起人；催化剂；促进剂；启动子
wordGroup: adhesion promoter 助粘剂，附着力促进剂

sentences.en: She became a leading promoter of European integration.
sentences.cn: 她成为欧洲一体化的主要支持者。

sentences.en: Aaron Copland was always the most energetic promoter of American music.
sentences.cn: 阿伦·柯普兰一直是是美国音乐最积极的倡导者。

sentences.en: The effect of IGFBP-3 on the growth hormone promoter activity stimulated by triiodothyronine was determined by dual-luciferase reporter assay.
sentences.cn: 通过双荧光素酶报告基因测定法测定了 IGFBP-3 对由三碘甲状腺素刺激的生长激素启动子活性的影响。
